inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically confirmed Multiple Myeloma, Salmon-Durie Stage II or III or International Staging System II or III that has not been previously treated.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bone marrow plasmacytosis with > or = 10% plasma cells, or sheets of plasma cells or a biopsy-proven plasmacytoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable levels of monoclonal protein (M protein): 1 g/dL Immunoglobulin G (IgG) or .5 g/dL Immunoglobulin A (IgA) on serum protein electrophoresis or > 200 mg of monoclonal light chain on a 24 hour urine protein electrophoresis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of greater than 12 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status < or = 2 (Karnofsky > or = 60%).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ and marrow function as defined below: Hgb > or = 9 g/dL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aspartate aminotransferase (AST)(SGOT) / alanine aminotransferase (ALT)(SGPT) < or = 2.5 X upper limit of normal (ULN).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have had chemotherapy or radiotherapy for multiple myeloma within 4 weeks of baseline.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Receiving any other investigational agents or therapy within 28 days of baseline.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of multiple myeloma, with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and was recently treated with pamidronate, calcitonin, and dialysis.
